Class Car

java.lang.Object
  Car

public class Car
extends java.lang.Object

A car has a certain fuel efficiency and a certain amount of fuel in the gas tank. The car can be driven a certain distance.

Version:
September 10, 2015
Author:
Anavi Tekriwal

Car(double fuelEfficiency)

 void addGas(double gallonsOfGas)

 void drive(double distance)
          Simulates driving the car the specified distance and reduces the amount of fuel in the tank.

          This returns the amount of gas in the car's tank in gallons
